title: We Need Daddy To Act His Age
itunes:title: We Need Daddy To Act His Age
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I don’t know what to do with my daddy. He’s not sick or anything, but in these times of Covid-19, cancer and heart disease, I worry about his health all the time. My dad is 87 years old and he loves to keep a house full of his friends and enjoy life. Every day, his house is like the senior center for men and they talk about women constantly, play cards, listen to music, watch movies and entertain elderly women...................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
